dataList.name: Noose
dataList.desc:
Ishmael's level rises to 40.
Ishmael's Uptie and Threadspin Tiers rise to Tier 4.
Ishmael gains [AaCePaBa] at the start of every encounter.

dataList.name: Reverse Knot
dataList.desc: When winning a clash using a Gloom affinity Skill, 1 ally with the lowest SP heals 5 SP

dataList.name: Desperate's Knot
dataList.desc:
Deal +10% damage with Envy, Wrath, and Gloom affinity Skills
Deal additional +10% corresponding affinity damage when activating 6+ Reson. with one of these affinities

dataList.name: Mermaid Oil
dataList.desc: Inflict 1 additional [Vibration] with a Skill that inflicts Tremor

dataList.name: Crossed Knot
dataList.desc: Turn End: if more than 15% of the Max HP was lost this turn, gain 2 Attack Power Up next turn

dataList.name: Compulsive's Knot
dataList.desc: When at less than 0 SP, Final Power +1 to Envy, Wrath, and Gloom affinities

dataList.name: Rusted Hook
dataList.desc: Gain 1 Poise when a Skill's first coin Heads Hits against an enemy with [Laceration]

dataList.name: Standard Issue Mag
dataList.desc: Identities with [Bullet] start encounters with +3 max Ammo

dataList.name: Unbreakable Knot
dataList.desc:
Ishmael's Skills gain +2 Final Power
When an ally dies, remaining allies gain 1 Haste and 1 Attack Power Up next turn (Once per turn)
